comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Sylvia De Grasse Fox (b. 1879), a socialite based in Philadelphia, who was reputedly "6 feet 2 inches in height...[and] decidedly handsome....Miss Fox is also a black-haired, brown-eyed beauty." query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F00D11F8355F13718... Her mother was the former Harriet Biddle. www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=45622652
